sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_csm_case_digest.CaseDigestUtilAjaxSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>CaseDigestUtilAjaxSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CaseDigestUtilAjaxSNC = Class.create();
CaseDigestUtilAjaxSNC.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getInternalFields: function() {
		var tableName = this.getParameter("sysparm_tableName");
		var sysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_sysId");
		var templateId = new sn_csm_case_digest.CaseDigest().getTemplateId(tableName, sysId);
		return new sn_csm_doctemplate.CSPDFUtil().getInternalFields(templateId);
	},
	
	getCaseState: function(caseId){
		if(!caseId)
			caseId = this.getParameter("sysparm_case_id");
		return new sn_csm_case_digest.CaseDigest().getCaseState(caseId);
	},
	
	isMajorCase: function(caseId){
		var isMajorCase = false;
		if(!caseId)
			caseId = this.getParameter("sysparm_case_id");
			if(GlidePluginManager.isActive(CaseDigestConstants.MIM_PLUGIN)){
				isMajorCase = new MajorCaseDigest().isMajorCase(caseId);
			}
		return isMajorCase;
	},
	
	saveForm: function() {
		var tableName = this.getParameter("sysparm_tableName");
		var sysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_sysId");
		var fieldInfo = this.getParameter("sysparm_fieldInfo");
		new sn_csm_case_digest.CaseDigest().saveForm(tableName, sysId, fieldInfo);
	},

	saveFormAndGetUrl: function() {
		var tableName = this.getParameter("sysparm_tableName");
		var sysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_sysId");
		var fieldInfo = this.getParameter("sysparm_fieldInfo");
		if (new sn_csm_case_digest.CaseDigest().saveForm(tableName, sysId, fieldInfo))
			return new sn_csm_case_digest.PreviewAjaxUtils().getPreviewUrl(tableName, sysId);
	},
	
	copytoChildCases: function() {
		var sysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_sysId");
		if(GlidePluginManager.isActive(CaseDigestConstants.MIM_PLUGIN)){
			return new MajorCaseDigest().copytoChildCases(sysId);
		}
	},
	
	publishtoCase: function() {
		var sysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_sysId");
		return new sn_csm_case_digest.CaseDigest().publish(sysId);
	},
	
	isPropagationEnabledforPCR: function(caseId) {
		var isPropagationEnabledforPCR = false;
		if(!caseId)
			caseId = this.getParameter("sysparm_case_id");
		if(GlidePluginManager.isActive(CaseDigestConstants.MIM_PLUGIN)){
			isPropagationEnabledforPCR = gs.getProperty(CaseDigestConstants.PARENT_CHILD_CASE_SYNC, false) == 'true' && new MajorCaseDigest().isMajorCase(caseId);
		}
		return isPropagationEnabledforPCR;
	},
	
	checkIfCommentsAreAddedByUser: function(pcrSysId){
		if(!pcrSysId)
			pcrSysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_pcr_id");
		return new sn_csm_case_digest.CaseDigest().checkIfCommentsAreAddedByUser(pcrSysId);
	},
	
	updatePostCaseReviewStateToInProgress: function (pcrSysId){
		if(!pcrSysId)
			pcrSysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_pcr_id");
		new sn_csm_case_digest.CaseDigest().updatePostCaseReviewStateToInProgress(pcrSysId);
	},
	
	deletePreviewPDF: function (){
		var tableName = this.getParameter("sysparm_tableName");
		var sysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_sysId");
		var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
		gr.get(sysId);
		if(gr.isValidRecord() && gr.canRead()){
			new sn_csm_doctemplate.CSPDFUtil().deleteDocument(tableName, sysId, gr.number);
		}
	},
	
    type: 'CaseDigestUtilAjaxSNC'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-03-22 11:46:23</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>12f556d673143300f74071ef64f6a7a0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>35</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CaseDigestUtilAjaxSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Case Digests" source="sn_csm_case_digest">8fa0059c73632300f74071ef64f6a76a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Case Digests">8fa0059c73632300f74071ef64f6a76a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_12f556d673143300f74071ef64f6a7a0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-02-11 00:51:29</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
